Person.Organization: PENNSYLVANIA STATE UNIV HERSHEY MED CTR

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: This work was supported by grant U10 HL109172, U10 HL109168, U10 HL109152, U10HL109257, U10 HL109046, U10 HL109250, U10 HL109164, U10 HL109086 to Elliot Israel, Bruce Levy, Wanda Phipatanakul, Nizar Jarjour, Sally Wenzel, Mario Castro, John Fahy, Gerry Teague, Benjamin Gaston, Serpil Erzurum, Anne Marie Irani, Eugene Bleecker, Deborah Meyers, Wendy Moore, Anne Fitzpatrick, David Mauger from the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute (NHLBI), a part of the National Institutes of Health (NIH). For publications, written, and/or oral presentations resulting from use of this data, please cite the following information: "The original data description for The Severe Asthma Research Program can be found here: ‘Responsiveness to Parenteral Corticosteroids and Lung Function Trajectory in Adults with Moderate-to-Severe Asthma.’ Am J Respir Crit Care Med . 2021 Apr 1;203(7):841-852. doi: 10.1164/rccm.202002-0454OC (PMID: 33290668) and ‘Baseline Features of the Severe Asthma Research Program (SARP III) Cohort: Differences with Age.’ J Allergy Clin Immunol Pract. Mar-Apr 2018;6(2):545-554.e4. doi: 10.1016/j.jaip.2017.05.032. Epub 2017 Aug 31. (PMID 28866107). The original data used for the analysis in this publication can be found in the NIH database of Genotypes and Phenotypes (dbGaP) under the accession number phs002788.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Asthma, Allergy and Inflammation, PUB)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-AAI-PUB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Asthma, Allergy and Inflammation. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.
